hero.title: Where Justice Meets Excellence
hero.subtitle: Basmet Al-Nezam Law Firm
hero.description: We are more than just a law firm - we are your strategic legal partner, providing precise solutions, building trust through expertise, and charting the path to justice with professionalism.

about.title: About Bassama Al-Nizam
about.subtitle: Bassama Al-Nizam Law Office
about.description: Bassama Al-Nizam Law Office for Legal Advocacy and Consultation is considered a leading reference in providing specialized legal services, combining deep expertise and enlightened vision to achieve justice and protect rights.
about.description2: The office distinguishes itself by providing integrated legal consultations in commercial cases, criminal cases, and personal status matters, while committed to defending women's rights and human rights. It serves a wide range of clients providing effective legal solutions based on professionalism and precision.
about.description3: With its classic elegant style, the office seeks to leave a distinctive mark in the field of law, embodying values of justice and integrity, and is keen on building relationships based on trust and credibility with its clients.
about.subtitle2: We combine deep systematic expertise and renewed legal vision
about.description4: Specialized in providing legal services and consultations with high professionalism and providing comprehensive legal solutions for individuals and companies, and we believe that trust and credibility are the foundation of legal success.
about.description5: We are more than just a law firm; we are a strategic legal partner that provides precise solutions and builds trust with expertise and paves the path of justice with professionalism.
about.description6: We believe that trust is built on details and that every case is a responsibility carefully managed and handled with complete confidentiality.
about.description7: Therefore, we are committed to ensuring that our legal mark is clear in work quality and professional performance.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Legal Solutions with Trust and Professionalism

litigation.title: Litigation & Court Representation
litigation.description: Representing clients before courts in personal, commercial, criminal, and enforcement cases with professionalism.

pleadings.title: Legal Pleadings & Memoranda
pleadings.description: Filing lawsuits, enforcement requests, defense memoranda, appeals, and cassation requests on platforms (Najiz, Muin, Dispute Committees).

consultation.title: Legal Consultations
consultation.description: Providing accurate consultations based on regulations and laws to help clients make correct legal decisions.

corporate.title: Company Formation
corporate.description: Establishing and registering companies and legal entities according to Saudi regulations with contract drafting and legal representation.

arbitration.title: Arbitration & Dispute Resolution
arbitration.description: Providing alternative dispute resolution solutions through arbitration and legal mediation to ensure quick case resolution.

debt.title: Debt Collection Services
debt.description: Collecting financial debts professionally through amicable or judicial means with legal procedures to ensure rights recovery.

government.title: Government Departments Review
government.description: Following up on transactions, completing procedures, issuing powers of attorney, and representing clients at public prosecution offices and police stations.

bankruptcy.title: Bankruptcy Services
bankruptcy.description: Comprehensive bankruptcy services including filing applications, following settlement procedures, financial reorganization, and representation before judicial authorities.

contracts.title: Contract Drafting & Legal Review
contracts.description: Preparing, reviewing, and drafting commercial and civil contracts of all types while ensuring protection of clients' rights and legal obligations.

compliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
compliance.description: Ensuring companies and individuals comply with Saudi regulations and laws, providing consultations on legal and regulatory requirements.

expertise.title: Legal Expertise
expertise.description: Highly qualified attorneys with extensive experience in Saudi law.

trust.title: Trust & Integrity
trust.description: We maintain the highest standards of professional ethics and confidentiality.

results.title: Proven Results
results.description: Track record of successful outcomes for our clients.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Available whenever you need legal assistance.

cta.title: Licensed & Certified Law Firm
cta.description: Fully licensed and regulated by Saudi authorities, ensuring the highest standards of legal practice and client protection.

cta.title: Need Legal Assistance?
cta.description: Contact us today for a consultation with our experienced legal team.

portfolio.title: Our Work
portfolio.subtitle: Successful Cases
portfolio.description: A selection of our successful legal cases and achievements.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Providing legal services that keep pace with legislative development and achieve justice with trust and credibility

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We strive to make justice and professionalism your companion in every legal path

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Integrity, confidentiality, commitment, efficiency, and innovation are the pillars of our client service.

testimonial1.name: Ahmed Al-Rashid
testimonial1.content: Exceptional legal expertise and professionalism. They handled our corporate matters with great care and attention to detail.

testimonial2.name: Fatima Al-Zahrani
testimonial2.content: Outstanding service and results. The team was always available and provided clear guidance throughout our legal process.

testimonial3.name: Mohammed Al-Qahtani
testimonial3.content: Highly recommended! Their knowledge of Saudi law and dedication to client success is unmatched.
